text: 2.4: FG 20.31Gu guigira gava khergiap nde ndi mbarav, gu guigira nden kora mbuav, nan ndava vhee guigira simgim, gu nzi mbatɨga muuŋgi. Gu mba gava khergiap, gu ndav simtɨgar nden nɨɨn za muuŋgi fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Gu mba gava khergi, nde kaŋgirga, gu guigira nde vuzvugiap, gu won ndavar nde nɨɨŋgi.
